pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genomic Random Interval (GRIN) // Improved version of 'GRIN' software that streamlines its use in practice to analyze genomic lesion data, accelerate its computing, and expand its analysis capabilities to answer additional scientific questions including a rigorous evaluation of the association of genomic lesions with RNA expression. Pounds, Stan, et al. (2013) DOI:10.1093/bioinformatics/btt372.
